pages.text: Water spells can be found in Ocean Ruins or from fishing

pages.title: Aqua Shield
pages.text: Grants the user Resistance 4 for 10 seconds + 2 per spell power $(li)Mana Cost: 50

pages.title: Freeze
pages.text: Shoots a chunk of snow that freezes and slows the target $(li)Mana Cost: 10

pages.title: Mend
pages.text: Heals the user for 4 hearts (more per spell power) and clear all negative effects $(li)Mana Cost: 40

pages.title: Overcast
pages.text: Allows the user to set the weather to raining $(li)Mana Cost: 90

pages.title: Bubble Beam
pages.text: Launches a bubble that deals damage and floats upwards over time $(li)Mana Cost: 10
